message.name: INF_SENT_TO
message.locale: for

message.name: INF_SINGLE_CLIENT_REFERRAL
message.locale: Single Client Service

message.name: INF_MULTIPLE_CLIENT_REFERRAL
message.locale: Multiple Client Service

message.name: INF_NOTIFICATION_HARDCOPY_EMAIL_FAIL_FOR_CLIENT
message.locale: The following %1s, %2s, can not be notified by hard copy or email, attempt a different means.

message.name: INF_NOTIFICATION_HARDCOPY_EMAIL_FAIL_FOR_PROVIDER
message.locale: The following %1s, %2s, can not be notified by hard copy or email, attempt a different means.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SERVICE_NAME_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED_IF_SERVICE_SELECTED
message.locale: The Service Name must not be entered if a Service is selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERRAL_DATE_AFTER_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATE
message.locale: The Referral Date, %1d, must be on or before the Service End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERRAL_DATE_BEFORE_SERVICE_OFFERING_START_DATE
message.locale: The Referral Date, %1d, must be on or after the Service Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_PROVISION_METHOD_MUST_BE_REFERRAL
message.locale: The service offering provision method must be referral.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SERVICE_NAME_OR_SERVICE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Service Name or Service must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FOLLOWUP_REQUIRED_IND_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_FOLLOWUP_WARNING_DAYS_ENTERED
message.locale: The follow-up required indicator must be entered if follow-up warning days is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FOLLOWUP_WARNING_DAYS_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_FOLLOWUP_REQUIRED_IND_SELECTED
message.locale: The follow-up warning days must be entered if the follow-up required indicator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FOLLOWUP_WARNING_DAYS_MUST_BE_NUMERIC
message.locale: The follow-up warning days must be numeric.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_FOLLOWUP_REQUIRED_IND_ENTERED
message.locale: The provider must be entered if the follow-up required indicator is entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MULTIPLE_PROVIDERS_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one Provider can be entered for the referral.

message.name: ERR_FV_CLIENT_MANDATORY
message.locale: A client must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REFERRED_BY_ME_REFERRED_BY_USER_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: The referred by me or referred by user must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ONLY_ONE_OF_REFERRED_BY_ME_OR_REFERRED_BY_USER_CAN_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either Referred By Me or Referred By a User can be entered for the referral.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REFERRAL_MUST_NOT_BE_CANCELLED_IF_NOTIFICATIONS_SENT_TO_CLIENT_OR_PROVIDER
message.locale: The referral must not be deleted if a notification has been sent to a client or provider

message.name: ERR_XRV_ONLY_ONE_CLIENT_CAN_BE_SELECTED_WHEN_MULTIPLE_CLIENTS_FALSE_ON_RELATED_SERVICE_OFFERING
message.locale: The multiple client indicator is false on the selected service, only one client can be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_PROVIDE_SERVICE
message.locale: The selected provider '%1s', does not provide the service '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_PROVIDE_SERVICE_FOR_REFERRAL_DATE
message.locale: The selected provider '%1s', does not provide the service '%2s' for the referral date.

message.name: ERR_FV_REASON_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_CLIENT_NOTIFICATION_TOO_LARGE
message.locale: The Client Notification entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROVIDER_NOTIFICATION_TOO_LARGE
message.locale: The Provider Notification entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: INF_DATE_BY
message.locale: %1d by
